464: print("\"Oh, $G Avatar, 'tis an unexpected pleasure to see you again!\"")
print("\"Hey, my old buddy $P! Good to see you again.\"")
print("\"Maldric, I am. Once Maldric the @boar hunter, now Maldric the cook.\"")
print("\"Aye, I used to live in the @forest and hunt wild boars.\"\n*\n\"But one day I presented a @roast boar as a gift to his @majesty, and he liked it so much he hired me as his @cook.\"")
print("\"Those were good times. But I'm happy here.\"")
print("\"The secret is in the spices. It's an old family @recipe.\"")
print(" Though for one so sweet, I must say I'm tempted.")

print("\"I @cook for all those who live in the @castle, and for any @guests who dine with Lord British as well.\"\n*\n\"'Tis sastisfying work, yet at times I wish I could @travel with one such as you...\"")
print("\"A fancier home than any of my family ever lived in. Yet I still miss my simple hut in the forest.\"")
print("\n*\n\"I wish it were still there, so I could invite you to come spend an evening by the @fireplace with me...")
print("\"There's fire enough in my kitchen, but 'tis no place for romance.\"")

print(""I shouldn't even speak of such things."

"After all, you are the Avatar, and I but a lowly cook. Please forgive me."
")
print("\"He's a good man. Likes plenty of @pepper in his stew.\"")
print("\"Spice puts some variety in life, is what I always say.\"")
print("\"You're a pretty spicy little number yourself!\"")
print("\"I've heard about all of your adventures. I wish I were a warrior too, and not just a cook!\"")
